\item {}

\item {}

\item {}

\item {}

\item {} 
show

\item {} 
rm, mv

\item {} 
Atom y Git

\end{enumerate}

\item {}

\item {}

\item {} 
Resolución de conflictos

\end{enumerate}

\PYG{k}{function} \PYG{n+nf}{is\PYGZus{}blank}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nv}{\PYGZdl{}value}\PYG{p}{)}
\PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}
    \PYG{k}{return} \PYG{k}{empty}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nv}{\PYGZdl{}value}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{o}{\PYGZam{}\PYGZam{}} \PYG{o}{!}\PYG{n+nb}{is\PYGZus{}numeric}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nv}{\PYGZdl{}value}\PYG{p}{);}
\PYG{p}{\PYGZcb{}}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}
